info.name: Canvis
info.description: Canvis Twist, the jewel of the Canvis family of OLED luminaires, is a luminous surface that dynamically changes shape and interacts with us through gestural control â€“ creating a relationship between human and luminaire that is without equal. Visual experience becomes nuanced, dimensional, and individually customizable. The complete Canvis family includes Twist, Drape, Screen, and Pose.
